# format(_:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a locale-aware string representation from a duration value.

## Declaration

```swift
func format(_ duration: Duration) -> String
```

## Parameters

- **duration**: The value to format.

## Return Value

A string representation of the duration.
title: format(_:)
